title: Brot
description: Mandelbrot and julia set rendering tool. Make aesthetic images of complex fractals.

title: Generative Art
description: A collection of my little generative art experiments. They are not much for now, but I really enjoy making them.

title: AwesomeSearch
description: This is a search engine for the awesome lists. I build it for the final high school project, because I wished there was a user friendly and visually oriented search for this awesome collection.

title: My Website 2020
description: The second personal website that I planned to be the website for 2020, but I decided to completely rebuild in Gatsby.js it after a month, because I wasn't satisfied with the performance.

title: Translator Agency
description: Landing website that I build for a local translational agency. This is actually my first website that I build professionally for a client.

title: Planet System
description: A simple web based planet system simulation. Draws paths of planets and their velocity + acceleration vectors.

title: Path Finding
description: A simple web based visualization of path finding algorithm. Allows you to generate a maze with backtrack algorithm and solve it with breath first search. Made for a school project.

title: Complex Set Art
description: Fractal graphics rendering program written in Go. This was very fun playing around when I made this in high school. Got some ecstatically pleasing results too.

title: My Website 2019
description: My first portfolio website that I built for myself back in 2019. There I host all of my older projects and 2 experimental blog posts.

title: Wikipedia Network
description: A graph based visualization of related pages on Wikipedia. Project was inspired by a similar visualization called "All roads lead to Philosophy".

title: Modulo Arithmetics
description: Visualization of patterns that emerge when computing a modulo of a changing number. Inspired by Mathologer video.

title: Julia Set Web
description: Simple web based visualization of julia set. Try changing the hyper parameter C and observe how the set changes.

title: SCNG App
description: Backend API and a mobile app made for the purpose of displaying school schedule and news for our school in Nova Gorica. Sadly this app never went fully live to all people at our school.

title: BS Teams Website
description: We, as a team of 8 young students, developed a landing website for an imaginary client. This workshop was called Next Talent Hub and was hosted by an awesome company based in Solkan.
